title: ninnE nammiti
sahitya:
ninnE nammiti nijamuga gati lOkamulO


anupallavi

  nannaDa calupaga nA vicAramu dIrci nambOruhAsanA divyatara jUci prasannamugamu


caraNam    nI mahAtyamu evarE nidAnimpa shakyamugAdu gadA shrI mAdhavE nI chAyEtula nokani 
gAncagalanE Emani ceppudu dEvI nutimpa nAdu vashamA I mahilO nI daya galgina bhayambu toligEnO
